title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 5-1.27 - Adequacy of distribution system
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 5-1.27 - Adequacy of distribution system

State Regulations

The public water system shall be maintained and operated by the supplier of water to assure a minimum working pressure of 20 pounds per square inch at ground level at all points in the distribution system. Measurement of pressure may be obtained from representative points of use. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
5-1.27

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
